name: Grab Apples
description:
Grab apples to score points. Featuring
  • Apples
  • Crab Apples
  • Bad Apples

Purple apples are bad.

Controls

Mouse and Keyboard:

  • Left - Left Arrow or A
  • Right - Right Arrow or D
  • Start - Space or Enter
  • Boost - Left Shift
  • Cancel or Pause - Escape

Xbox Controller:

  • Movement - D-Pad or Left Stick
  • Start - Start or A
  • Boost - X
  • Cancel or Pause - B
